<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a8c21c6dda4c7cfb40fc54ff0fc7e5e3f"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a8c21c6dda4c7cfb40fc54ff0fc7e5e3f">isBBPendingDeletion</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a7962416c960380f3b76c88e536514a1a">BasicBlockT</a> &#42;DelBB)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a6c1229274a768152e5ed6af3872af602">Strategy</a> == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a2655b89361decf2c1493792dc14e5a56a483c336d7d9fe614a8b5aae1e746e01f">UpdateStrategy::Eager</a> || <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a03640c958debd0b9a525cff8fe5a11ed">DeletedBBs</a>.empty())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a03640c958debd0b9a525cff8fe5a11ed">DeletedBBs</a>.contains(DelBB);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns true if either of DT or PDT is valid and the tree has at</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// least one update pending. If DT or PDT is nullptr it is treated</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// whether there is MachineBasicBlock awaiting deletion.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns false under Eager UpdateStrategy.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a49a3abb0b92111611d0d88de7105ef70"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a49a3abb0b92111611d0d88de7105ef70">hasPendingUpdates</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#ad09768c934fd481e5a641cc327d1a5cb">PendUpdates</a>.size() != <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#ab4889b35d9c71f2a1cee818e1d32563b">PendPDTUpdateIndex</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///@&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\name Mutation APIs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// These methods provide APIs for submitting updates to the DomTreeT and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the PostDominatorTree.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Note: There are two strategies to update the DomTreeT and the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// PostDominatorTree:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 1 Eager UpdateStrategy: Updates are submitted and then flushed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// immediately.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 2 Lazy UpdateStrategy: Updates are submitted but only flushed when you</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// explicitly call Flush APIs. It is recommended to use this update strategy</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// when you submit a bunch of updates multiple times which can then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// add up to a large number of updates between two queries on the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// DomTreeT. The incremental updater can reschedule the updates or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// decide to recalculate the dominator tree in order to speedup the updating</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// process depending on the number of updates.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Although GenericDomTree provides several update primitives,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// it is not encouraged to use these APIs directly.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Notify DTU that the entry block was replaced.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Recalculate all available trees and flush all BasicBlocks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// awaiting deletion immediately.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#ab6ae3c90eff5a8a46fe9ed9909e7d3cd"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FuncT&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#ab6ae3c90eff5a8a46fe9ed9909e7d3cd">recalculate</a>(FuncT &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Submit updates to all available trees.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The Eager Strategy flushes updates immediately while the Lazy Strategy</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// queues the updates.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Note: The &quot;existence&quot; of an edge in a CFG refers to the CFG which DTU is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// in sync with + all updates before that single update.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// CAUTION!</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 1 It is required for the state of the LLVM IR to be updated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#42;before&#42; submitting the updates because the internal update routine will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// analyze the current state of the CFG to determine whether an update</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// is valid.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 2 It is illegal to submit any update that has already been submitted,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// i.e., you are supposed not to insert an existent edge or delete a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// nonexistent edge.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a363d442ff7f9a13eafaee275aad9f54c"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a363d442ff7f9a13eafaee275aad9f54c">applyUpdates</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;UpdateT&gt;</a> Updates);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Apply updates that the critical edge (FromBB, ToBB) has been</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// split with NewBB.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#abb620d887e5e200028c5e0fb37f82592"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#abb620d887e5e200028c5e0fb37f82592">splitCriticalEdge</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a7962416c960380f3b76c88e536514a1a">BasicBlockT</a> &#42;FromBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a7962416c960380f3b76c88e536514a1a">BasicBlockT</a> &#42;ToBB,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a7962416c960380f3b76c88e536514a1a">BasicBlockT</a> &#42;NewBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Submit updates to all available trees. It will also</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 1 discard duplicated updates,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 2 remove invalid updates. (Invalid updates means deletion of an edge that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// still exists or insertion of an edge that does not exist.)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The Eager Strategy flushes updates immediately while the Lazy Strategy</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// queues the updates.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Note: The &quot;existence&quot; of an edge in a CFG refers to the CFG which DTU is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// in sync with + all updates before that single update.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// CAUTION!</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 1 It is required for the state of the LLVM IR to be updated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#42;before&#42; submitting the updates because the internal update routine will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// analyze the current state of the CFG to determine whether an update</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// is valid.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 2 It is illegal to submit any update that has already been submitted,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// i.e., you are supposed not to insert an existent edge or delete a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// nonexistent edge.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 3 It is only legal to submit updates to an edge in the order CFG changes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// are made. The order you submit updates on different edges is not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// restricted.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a28512659006140e4ac78ee3a68043dd5"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a28512659006140e4ac78ee3a68043dd5">applyUpdatesPermissive</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;UpdateT&gt;</a> Updates);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///@&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///@&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\name Flush APIs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// CAUTION! By the moment these flush APIs are called, the current CFG needs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// to be the same as the CFG which DTU is in sync with + all updates</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// submitted.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Flush DomTree updates and return DomTree.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// It flushes Deleted BBs if both trees are up-to-date.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// It must only be called when it has a DomTree.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a0ec32b69ca3c12883ee03ad1c2bd92d9"><span class="doxyHighlight">  DomTreeT &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a0ec32b69ca3c12883ee03ad1c2bd92d9">getDomTree</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Flush PostDomTree updates and return PostDomTree.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// It flushes Deleted BBs if both trees are up-to-date.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// It must only be called when it has a PostDomTree.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a1b9134f9520d0b3b4b807db72d540e25"><span class="doxyHighlight">  PostDomTreeT &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a1b9134f9520d0b3b4b807db72d540e25">getPostDomTree</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Apply all pending updates to available trees and flush all BasicBlocks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// awaiting deletion.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a43c80a160270d75d99cfeb080c165694"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a43c80a160270d75d99cfeb080c165694">flush</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#abc26be7bd6050f81f1a42835451926f0">applyDomTreeUpdates</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a26a51dd25592d4f008dd31fbe5161cfc">applyPostDomTreeUpdates</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#aa7ab6accfde7220340d4862ff76bd9c0">dropOutOfDateUpdates</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///@&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Debug method to help view the internal state of this class.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#aefa1d7d67dd758fb993876e62c56890d"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#aa863693eef567397d9c292da5bf22d34">LLVM&#95;DUMP&#95;METHOD</a> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#aefa1d7d67dd758fb993876e62c56890d">dump</a>() </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
